job_tasks.phrase: Develop and maintain robust, scalable, and secure Python backend services
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to building and maintaining backend software services, which falls under traditional software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Build and deploy containerized applications using Docker and Kubernetes
job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'containerized applications', 'Docker', and 'Kubernetes' indicates tasks related to deploying and managing applications in a software engineering context.

job_tasks.phrase: Fine-tune and optimize large language models (LLMs) for specific business applications
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Fine-tune and optimize large language models (LLMs)' directly relates to adapting and improving generative AI models.
Implementing RAG systems is a core task in building applications on top of LLMs.

job_tasks.phrase: Deploy and monitor AI models in production environments
job_tasks.justification: The actions of 'Deploy and monitor AI models in production environments' are central to MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with product managers and stakeholders to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions understanding business requirements and translating them into technical solutions, which is the core of business understanding.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with product managers and stakeholders
Troubleshoot and resolve issues in production AI systems
Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI and machine learning

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development, fine-tuning, and deployment of Large Language Models (LLMs) and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems. It also mentions building production-grade backend services, containerization, and collaboration to translate business needs into AI solutions, aligning perfectly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
